newsitem.title: USA: Wilmington Trust silver stocks fall in week.
newsitem.headline: Wilmington Trust silver stocks fall in week.

text.p: Wilmington Trust deliverable silver stocks slipped 621,679 ounces to 57,639,217 ounces in the week ended December 18, the COMEX division of the New York Mercantile Exchange (NYMEX) said Tuesday.
Wilmington Trust in Delaware becomes an official exchange silver depositary from January 1, 1997.
NYMEX will report Wilmington Trust data weekly until January 2, 1997 when Wilmington's eligible and registered silver stocks will be reported in the exchange's daily metal warehouse data.
COMEX silver warehouse stocks, excluding Wilmington Trust silver stocks, rose 535,838 ounces Tuesday to 144,191,631 ounces.
